reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Adams makes complex concepts in physics easy to understand. Her lectures are engaging and well-organized.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Professor Bennett is exceptional. He explains mathematical theories with clarity and always provides helpful examples.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Carter is knowledgeable but her lectures can be a bit dry. Her office hours are very helpful for additional support.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Professor Davis brings history to life with his storytelling. His classes are both informative and entertaining.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Evans is very knowledgeable but her teaching style is hard to follow. The class can be quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Professor Foster has a passion for literature that is contagious. His analysis of texts is insightful and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Green's lectures are informative but sometimes lack engagement. The subject matter is interesting, though.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Professor Harris explains economic theories in a way that is both accessible and relevant. His real-world examples are very useful.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an excellent teacher who is always available for help. Her coding exercises are practical and well-designed.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Professor King has a deep understanding of philosophy but his lectures can sometimes be overly complex.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is very engaging and makes sociology come alive through real-world examples and interactive discussions.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Professor Martinez is highly knowledgeable and passionate about political science. His classes are always thought-provoking and well-structured.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Nelson is a competent teacher but the subject can be difficult to grasp. More practical examples would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Professor O'Connor is great at explaining engineering principles and his hands-on approach makes learning effective.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is passionate about environmental science and her enthusiasm is reflected in her engaging lectures and assignments.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Professor Quinn provides detailed and insightful analyses of art pieces. His knowledge of art history is impressive and inspiring.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Roberts' lectures are sometimes disorganized, making it hard to follow the course material effectively.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Professor Smith is an excellent teacher who makes music theory accessible and enjoyable. His classes are always engaging.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Dr. Turner is passionate about astronomy and her lectures are filled with fascinating insights about the universe.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Professor Wilson is knowledgeable but sometimes his explanations are too brief. More detailed instructions would improve the course.
